name: Vallowex
description: The Vallowex is a large aberration with a solid body, featuring a long spiked tongue and a powerful tail, making it a notable presence in both aquatic and terrestrial settings.
memorable: Its Aura of Thirst can debilitate enemies, causing disadvantage and resulting in exhaustion over time, while its ability to swallow foes presents a dramatic combat dynamic.
goals: To disrupt and incapacitate enemies through exhaustion and diseases while feeding.
relations: Related to other aberrations; could be encountered near water bodies along with aquatic creatures.
environment: Typically found in watery environments, such as lakes or rivers.
strengths: Strong in close combat with high hit points and effective multiattack capabilities, as well as the ability to breathe both air and water.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, making it less effective in social situations and strategies that require cleverness.
attacks: The Vallowex can use its spiked tongue to grapple foes or deliver piercing damage, alongside bludgeoning damage from its tail. It can also swallow smaller targets for additional effects.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Thirst can impose disadvantage on attacks and cause exhaustion if enemies stay within range.
senses: Possesses blindsight within 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without needing sight.
skills: Skilled in stealth and aware of its surroundings, giving it an advantage in aquatic ambushes.
additional_information: Can release a cloud of microscopic eggs that can cause a debilitating disease if ingested.
Grappling foes allows it to swallow and control them during combat.
Only one creature can be swallowed at a time, increasing tactical decisions in encounters.
test_queries: large aquatic monster with a deadly aura
creature that grapples and swallows foes
chaotic monster that thrives in water
